interests.name: Fish Market
interests.description: Local market where you can purchase fresh fish

interests.name: Local Market
interests.description: Local market where you can purchase local products and try the local food
interests.review: You can definitely get things for a lower price if you are willing to bargain!

interests.name: Cathedrale de St-Pierre
interests.description: This famous cathedral is best known for its historic significance as the church where John Calvin gave his inspiring sermons during the mid-16th century.

interests.name: Eiffel Tower
interests.description: Completed in 1889, this colossal landmark, although initially hated by many Parisians, is now a famous symbol of French civic pride.
